loaderCheckAgainIfServerStarted: Check again if the server has started
loaderNoResponse: The server did not respond within a reasonable time.
loaderErrRemoteServerNotReachable: Check your settings and ensure that Memos is reachable at the provided URL.
settingsErrPathDoesNotExist: The specified path does not exist.
settingsOverview: Leave fields empty for default values. You must restart the app for the changes to take effect.
settingsViewCenteredDescription: Starts the app centered on the screen. Disable to restore the window to the exact position where you left it.
settingsViewFullscreenDescription: Starts the app in fullscreen. WARNING: You'll need to use Alt+F4/Ctrl+W/Cmd+W to close the window.
settingsViewResizableDescription: Allows the window to be resized. Should remain enabled in most cases.
settingsMemospotRemoteServerDescription: Use a remote Memos server instead of the bundled one.
settingsMemospotRemoteServerURLDescripti: Insert a URL pointing to a Memos server. Always prefer HTTPS.
settingsMemospotErrInvalidServer: No Memos server found on the provided URL.
settingsMemospotUserAgentDescription: Browser user agent string for the WebView. May be useful for hardened proxy servers. Leave blank for default.
settingsMemospotUpdaterDescription: Prompt whenever an update is available.
settingsMemospotMigrationsDescription: Extra database migrations that run when Memos is updated. These may address issues that were not handled by Memos and can also improve the user experience with Memospot.
settingsMemospotBackupsDescription: Currently, backups are only run before database migrations.
settingsMemospotEnvironmentVariablesDesc:
May be used to configure the WebView.
Format is VARIABLE=VALUE, separated by newlines.
settingsMemosBinaryPathDescription: Use a specific Memos binary instead of the bundled one.
settingsMemosWorkingDirectoryDescription: Path to the Memos working directory.
settingsMemosDataDirectoryDescription: Path to the Memos data directory.
settingsMemosBindAddressDescription: Binding to 0.0.0.0 will allow access from network and is discouraged.
settingsMemosBindPortDescription: The port specified here is preferred, but it will be transparently overridden by Memospot if it is already in use.
settingsMemosEnvironmentVariablesDescrip:
Environment variables to pass to the Memos binary.
Format is VARIABLE=VALUE, separating variables by newlines.
WARNING: managed variables like MEMOS_MODE will be ignored.
